property.name: enable.unrecoverable.reset
property.description: Determines if resetting CDAP should be enabled. **WARNING: Enabling this option makes it possible to delete all applications and data; NO RECOVERY IS POSSIBLE!**

property.name: app.artifact.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories scanned for system artifacts to add to the artifact repository

property.name: app.program.runtime.extensions.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories scanned for program runtime extension.

property.name: data.local.storage.blocksize
property.description: Block size in bytes for data fabric when in standalone mode

property.name: data.local.storage.cachesize
property.description: Cache size in bytes for data fabric when in standalone mode

property.name: log.publish.num.partitions
property.description: Number of CDAP Kafka service partitions to publish the logs to

property.name: log.retention.duration.days
property.description: Log file HDFS retention duration in days

property.name: metrics.data.table.retention.resolution.1.seconds
property.description: Retention resolution of the 1-second resolution table in seconds; default retention period is 2 hours

property.name: router.address
property.description: CDAP Router service address to which CDAP UI connects (deprecated; use router.server.address directly)

property.name: router.server.address
property.description: CDAP Router service address to which CDAP UI connects

property.name: stream.container.instances
property.description: Number of YARN container instances for the stream handler; in standalone mode, it's always one

property.name: zookeeper.quorum
property.description: ZooKeeper quorum string; specifies the ZooKeeper host:port; substitute the quorum (FQDN1:2181,FQDN2:2181,...) for the components shown here

property.name: local.kafka.dir
property.description: Kafka server artifact and its dependencies

property.name: preview.enabled
property.description: Determines whether to enable preview in standalone
